title: [1.12.2][Water Mechanics —— 水力学] 1.12的气泡柱！
author: 索菲缇娅
txt_content:
本帖最后由 乐之叶 于 2020-6-14 21:25 编辑 

介绍
此 mod 仿制了在MC 1.13版本中添加的气泡柱 。
它是如何工作的？这个 mod 将原版的岩浆块和灵魂沙替换为可以产生气泡柱的新的方块，你不用担心其他地方会与原版不同。新的方块有和原版一样的特性，如减速等因此包括凋落物和怪物等实体会收到他们影响
This mod emulates the bubble columns introduced in the 1.13 version.
How does it work? The mod replaces the soulsand and the magma block with custom ones that place the bubbles, but don't worry they will continue to be the blocks you know and love so much.
They have the same properties of the vanilla ones(speaking of speed and how the player moves), which i found in the vanilla code.
It works with every kind of entity, including dropped items and mobs.

特性
灵魂沙气泡柱
SoulSand bubble column elevator;
岩浆块气泡柱Magma Block bubble column;
即将到来：漂浮的物品
SOON: Floating items in water;
即将到来：作者会尝试添加 含水方块 SOON: I will try to add waterlogging;
演示GIF较大（5.4M），请耐心等待
